title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message:
Tried with multiple ioboards, flex cables and all combinations in between.

If it starts up (without flex) and I connect the flex (while running) we get a green/orange light. But the board won't start when flex cable is connected.

Jacks on both ends look okay.

With flex cable connected, we're missing PP5V_S4RS3.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: Are you 100% sure using the correct year flex and board? Not plugged in the flex in reverse? Inspect connector on the board for corrosion?

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: I am 99% sure, it's an 821-1722 in case you happen to know the part number off hand.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message:
Board starts up fine with a battery connected.

:/

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: That is the correct cable. Are you plugging in this cable the right way around?? Also getting a green/orange light without the cable is impossible.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message:
There is no light with the flex disconnected, only when connected.

Board works fine, with flex connected, if battery is connected too.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: Acok pulled low when flex connected?

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: SMC_BS_ACOK at R5187 is 3.3 with and without the flex cable connected.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message:
Just had another board identical to this one come in.

They only work with my 85w Mag Safe 2 charger for some reason.

85w Magsafe 1 with adapter won't start it.


Best part is it came from another shop that tried to charge the customer $1,800 for a new board.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: Having the same issue, found a solution?

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: I also had this problem last week. making sure a known-good battery was plugged in at the same time fixed the issue but it wouldnt work off of just the charger for some reason.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: I found the 820-00165 will only work off a Genuine MagSafe2 adapter, and not a MagSafe 1 with a little converter on it.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
message: Is that post liquid damage? I've found the same thing (which is super obnoxious) but I want to verify that it's not the liquid damage having done something to make magsafe 1's not work.

title: 820-00165-A - Only works when IOBoard Flex is disconnected.
